item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Slimey, post:4, topic:478767”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=596989.msg4203927#msg4203927 date=1358635576]
Or you could just not advertise on our forums. This isn’t a place for you to take members to your forum, this is a place to ask for help on frontend and backend development of websites or discuss certain factors of websites.
[/quote]

I don’t see a reason to care, as Moparscape is dead, nothing to it anymore. A free forum with a good theme is about all it has.[/quote]

  1. The free forum part:
    You’ll find that SMF is honestly one of the best forum software there is. It has similar benchmarks towards vBulletin and is much faster than IPB due to the fact that depends highly on Ajax. You can put pepper on shit but it’s still shit, people look too much towards the aesthetics before they look at the core and the speeds. That’s the most important part. People seem to dislike SMF because it isn’t as easily editable and customizable from the ACP, the admin control panel on the paid software is more noob friendly whereas you have to hard-code it in while using SMF.

  2. The dead part.
    MoparScape is years away from being inactive and dead. We’re nowhere near that. There’s still on average 1600 posts daily, that’s miles away from being dead. Don’t be so naive as to even attempt and say that. We may not be as active as we once were but we’re certainly not dead.

I rest my case.

Read full topic
